translations: 使堕落；放荡（debauch 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: This debauched seductress in black, took me…
sentences.translation: 这位荒淫的黑衣女子占有了我…

sentences.sentence: It just wasn't debauched enough, so now you're back to acting?
sentences.translation: 是不是你觉得还不够堕落，所以又跑回来演戏？

sentences.sentence: One day, in her debauched life, she met a mysterious man. Who is this man?
sentences.translation: 有一天，在她落泊的生活中，她遇到了一位神秘人物，他到底是谁？
